package:
dcsl_swarm_director 0.1.0 The dcsl_swarm_director package contains the dcsl_swarm_director node that subscribes to the cmd_vel_array topic with TwistArray messages and publishes cmd_velX topics with Twist messages where X is the array index from the TwistArray. It is designed for use with multi-agent systems. Brendan Andrade -->
BSD
http://ros.org/wiki/dcsl_swarm_director
Brendan Andrade
